forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with occasional rain. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
